title: Katie Price makes crude gesture as she sneaks out of ex Kris Boyson's home
text:

Katie Price went makeup-free as she was spotted leaving ex Kris Boyson's home.

The mum-of-five, 41, made a crude gesture towards her toyboy ex, 30, as she clambered into her car after she come crawling back to him.

Katie showed off her glowing make-up free complexion and left her extensions in a tousled style when she snuck out of her former flame's Gravesend home.

However, the businesswoman's overnight stay didn't go unnoticed as she was spied getting into her car while on the driveway.

Clad in a tracksuit, Kris didn't miss an opportunity to say goodbye to his ex when she left his property in the morning.

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

It isn't the first time she has been caught sneaking into her ex's home.

It's claimed were said to have been flirting up a storm all week in secret on their messages.

A source told The Sun Online : "She used a friend's car to try and avoid being spotted.

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

"She's been messaging Kris in secret all week and it looks like they're back together.

"The thing is Charles is still living at her house and working on the house rennovation. It's going to be really awkward."

The Mirror have approached Katie Price and Kris Boyson's representative.

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

(Image: STRICTLY NO BYLINE)

Things turned sour for engaged Katie and Kris back in August when the glamour model dumped the personal trainer for new man Charlie.

Katie invited Charles to join her on a family holiday to Turkey while a heartbroken Kris was seen back in Blighty moving her stuff out of his home in bin bags.

A month later, the exes were awkwardly reunited at Thorpe Park's Fright Night where they pictured having a showdown in front of Katie's son Junior.

They have both refused to rule out a reunion, saying things were still "up in the air".

Now Katie is said to have dumped Charles, a reunion could be on the cards with Kris.
description: A makeup-free Katie has been spotted outside Kris Boyson's home - sparking rumours she has reconciled with her ex
